nodes.text: Leonore Luxury Liners Incorporated was a starship manufacturer that produced the Indulgent-class luxury starliner. The class had a limited run and was exclusively sold to large cruise line corporations. The designers spared no expense in its building and outfitting the starliners and during the Imperial Era, the vessel was one of the most flamboyantly luxurious liners being produced.

In the new Star Wars canon, Leonore Luxury Liners Incorporated was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1997 video game Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter.
